section.section: In this section the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Utility provider" includes cable service, Internet access service, voice over Internet service, telephone or wireless telephone service, and other similar providers.

"Waiver of customer liability" means an optional agreement:
between a utility provider and a customer of the utility provider;
that is contained in:
under which the utility provider agrees, in return for a specified charge payable by the customer to the utility provider, to waive all or part of the customer's liability to the utility provider for incurred charges during a defined period in the event of any of the following qualifying events or conditions involving the customer:

text.section: Notwithstanding any provision of this article to the contrary, a waiver of customer liability is not considered insurance for purposes of this article.
